#
# TEMPORARY Build file, AUTO-GENERATED by http://vcproj2cmake.sf.net
# DO NOT CHECK INTO VERSION CONTROL OR APPLY "PERMANENT" MODIFICATIONS!!
#

# >= 2.6 due to crucial set_property(... COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_* ...)
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)
if(COMMAND cmake_policy)
  if(POLICY CMP0005)
    cmake_policy(SET CMP0005 NEW) # automatic quoting of brackets
  endif(POLICY CMP0005)

  if(POLICY CMP0011)
    # we do want the includer to be affected by our updates,
    # since it might define project-global settings.
    cmake_policy(SET CMP0011 OLD)
  endif(POLICY CMP0011)
  if(POLICY CMP0015)
    # .vcproj contains relative paths to additional library directories, thus we need to be able to cope with that
    cmake_policy(SET CMP0015 NEW)
  endif(POLICY CMP0015)
endif(COMMAND cmake_policy)

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "././cmake/Modules" ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH})

set(V2C_CONFIG_DIR_LOCAL "./cmake/vcproj2cmake")

# include the main file for pre-defined vcproj2cmake helper functions
include(vcproj2cmake_func)

# include the main file for pre-defined vcproj2cmake definitions
include(vcproj2cmake_defs)

include(${V2C_CONFIG_DIR_LOCAL}/hook_pre.txt OPTIONAL)

project( MIO )

# this part is for including a file which contains
# _globally_ applicable settings for all sub projects of a master project
# (compiler flags, path settings, platform stuff, ...)
# e.g. have vcproj2cmake-specific MasterProjectDefaults_vcproj2cmake
# which then _also_ includes a global MasterProjectDefaults module
# for _all_ CMakeLists.txt. This needs to sit post-project()
# since e.g. compiler info is dependent on a valid project.
# MasterProjectDefaults_vcproj2cmake is supposed to define
# generic settings (such as V2C_HOOK_PROJECT, defined as e.g.
# ./cmake/vcproj2cmake/hook_project.txt, and other hook include variables below).
# NOTE: it usually should also reset variables V2C_LIBS, V2C_SOURCES etc.
# as used below since they should contain directory-specific contents only, not accumulate!
include(MasterProjectDefaults_vcproj2cmake OPTIONAL)
# hook e.g. for invoking Find scripts as expected by
# the _LIBRARIES / _INCLUDE_DIRS mappings created
# by your include/dependency map files.
include(${V2C_HOOK_PROJECT} OPTIONAL)

    set(SOURCES_files_Source_Files
      ../src/mdio.c
      ../src/mdioconfig.c
      ../src/mdiodir.c
      ../src/mdiodlg.c
      ../src/mdiodraw.c
      ../src/mdiofile.c
      ../src/mdiofont.c
      ../src/mdiogui.c
      ../src/mdiojoy.c
      ../src/mdiomusic.c
      ../src/mdionet.c
      ../src/mdiopc.c
      ../src/mdiopic.c
      ../src/mdiopicgif.c
      ../src/mdiopicjpeg.c
      ../src/mdiorgb.c
      ../src/mdiosprite.c
      ../src/mdiosys.c
      ../src/mdiotime.c
      ../src/mdioutil.c
      ../src/mdiowin.c
      ../src/mdiowindlg.c
      ../src/mdiowingraph.c
      ../src/mdiowintext.c
      ../src/mdiowintop.c
      ../src/mio.c
      ../src/mioconfig.c
      ../src/miocrypto.c
      ../src/miodir.c
      ../src/miodlg.c
      ../src/miodraw.c
      ../src/mioerrmsg.in
      ../src/mioerror.c
      ../src/mioerrstr.in
      ../src/miofile.c
      ../src/miofont.c
      ../src/miogui.c
      ../src/miojoy.c
      ../src/miolexer.c
      ../src/miolexread.in
      ../src/miolexscan.in
      ../src/miomouse.c
      ../src/miomusic.c
      ../src/mionet.c
      ../src/miopc.c
      ../src/miopic.c
      ../src/miorgb.c
      ../src/miosprite.c
      ../src/miosys.c
      ../src/miotext.c
      ../src/miotime.c
      ../src/mioview.c
      ../src/miowin.c
      ../src/miowindlg.c
      ../src/miowindow.c
      ../src/miowingraph.c
      ../src/miowintext.c
      ../src/miowrapper.c
    )
    source_group("Source Files" FILES ${SOURCES_files_Source_Files})

    set(SOURCES_Source_Files
      ${SOURCES_files_Source_Files}
    )

    set(SOURCES_files_Header_Files
      ../ready/src/ederr.h
      ../src/edint.h
      ../ready/src/edtext.h
      ../src/fileman.h
      ../src/libungif/gif_lib.h
      ../src/jpeg-6b/jconfig.h
      ../src/jpeg-6b/jerror.h
      ../src/jpeg-6b/jmorecfg.h
      ../src/jpeg-6b/jpeglib.h
      ../src/language.h
      ../src/levent.h
      ../src/mdio.h
      ../src/mdioconfig.h
      ../src/mdiodir.h
      ../src/mdiodlg.h
      ../src/mdiodraw.h
      ../src/mdiofile.h
      ../src/mdiofont.h
      ../src/mdiogui.h
      ../src/mdiojoy.h
      ../src/mdiomusic.h
      ../src/mdionet.h
      ../src/mdiopc.h
      ../src/mdiopic.h
      ../src/mdiopicgif.h
      ../src/mdiopicjpeg.h
      ../src/mdiorgb.h
      ../src/mdiosprite.h
      ../src/mdiosys.h
      ../src/mdiotime.h
      ../src/mdioutil.h
      ../src/mdiowin.h
      ../src/mdiowindlg.h
      ../src/mdiowingraph.h
      ../src/mdiowintext.h
      ../src/mdiowintop.h
      ../src/mio.h
      ../src/miocommands.h
      ../src/mioconfig.h
      ../src/miocrypto.h
      ../src/miodialogs.h
      ../src/miodir.h
      ../src/miodlg.h
      ../src/miodraw.h
      ../src/mioerr.h
      ../src/mioerror.h
      ../src/miofile.h
      ../src/miofont.h
      ../src/miogui.h
      ../src/miojoy.h
      ../src/miolexer.h
      ../src/miomouse.h
      ../src/miomusic.h
      ../src/mionet.h
      ../src/miopc.h
      ../src/miopic.h
      ../src/miorgb.h
      ../src/miosprite.h
      ../src/miosys.h
      ../src/miotext.h
      ../src/miotime.h
      ../src/miotypes.h
      ../src/mioview.h
      ../src/miowin.h
      ../src/miowindlg.h
      ../src/miowindow.h
      ../src/miowingraph.h
      ../src/miowintext.h
      ../src/turing.h
    )
    source_group("Header Files" FILES ${SOURCES_files_Header_Files})

    set(SOURCES_Header_Files
      ${SOURCES_files_Header_Files}
    )

  set(SOURCES_
    ${SOURCES_Source_Files}
    ${SOURCES_Header_Files}
  )

include_directories(BEFORE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})

include(${V2C_HOOK_POST_SOURCES} OPTIONAL)

if(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Release")

  include_directories(
    p:/ready/src
  )

  # hook include after all definitions have been made
  # (but _before_ target is created using the source list!)
  include(${V2C_HOOK_POST_DEFINITIONS} OPTIONAL)

  set(SOURCES
    ${SOURCES_}
    ${V2C_SOURCES}
  )

  link_directories(
    ${V2C_LIB_DIRS}
  )

  add_library( MIO STATIC ${SOURCES} )

  target_link_libraries(MIO
    ${V2C_LIBS}
  )

  # e.g. to be used for tweaking target properties etc.
  include(${V2C_HOOK_POST_TARGET} OPTIONAL)
endif(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Release")
if(TARGET MIO)

  set_property(TARGET MIO APPEND PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_RELEASE
    NDEBUG
    _LIB
  )

  if(UNUSED__MANAGED_BY_CMAKE)
    set_property(TARGET MIO APPEND PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_RELEASE
      WIN32
    )
  endif(UNUSED__MANAGED_BY_CMAKE)
endif(TARGET MIO)

if(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES OR CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")

  include_directories(
    ../../ready/src
    ../../ready/src/tools
    p:/ready/src
  )

  # hook include after all definitions have been made
  # (but _before_ target is created using the source list!)
  include(${V2C_HOOK_POST_DEFINITIONS} OPTIONAL)

  set(SOURCES
    ${SOURCES_}
    ${V2C_SOURCES}
  )

  link_directories(
    ${V2C_LIB_DIRS}
  )

  add_library( MIO STATIC ${SOURCES} )

  target_link_libraries(MIO
    ${V2C_LIBS}
  )

  # e.g. to be used for tweaking target properties etc.
  include(${V2C_HOOK_POST_TARGET} OPTIONAL)
endif(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES OR CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")
if(TARGET MIO)

  set_property(TARGET MIO APPEND PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_DEBUG
    _CRTDBG_MAP_ALLOC
    _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
    _DEBUG
    _LIB
    _MEMORY_CHECK
    _WIN32_IE=0x0300
    _WINOOT_
  )

  if(UNUSED__MANAGED_BY_CMAKE)
    set_property(TARGET MIO APPEND PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_DEBUG
      WIN32
      _WINDOWS
    )
  endif(UNUSED__MANAGED_BY_CMAKE)
endif(TARGET MIO)

#set_property(TARGET MIO PROPERTY PROJECT_LABEL "MIO")

v2c_rebuild_on_update(MIO "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/MIO.vcproj" ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE} "vcproj2cmake/scripts/vcproj2cmake.rb" ".")

include(${V2C_HOOK_POST} OPTIONAL)
